user_data.target_needs: I wanted comfortable and stylish sandals suitable for casual outings and everyday wear.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a comfortable and versatile sandal that I could wear for casual outings and errands. The secure z-strap style and cushy midsole were appealing, as I needed something that would provide comfort during walks in town. My previous positive experience with the brand also influenced my decision, as I trusted their quality and fit.

I wanted a lightweight and comfortable sandal for everyday use. The anti-slip massage footbed and adjustable fit were important features for me. Although I ended up giving them to my sister, the decision was based on the comfort and style that I observed, which made me consider them for myself initially.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer a good balance of comfort, fit, and quality. I value items that are well-made and maintain their shape and appearance after washing. I appreciate clothing that fits well in the chest and shoulders while allowing for some looseness in the waist, as well as socks that provide a snug fit without slipping. I also enjoy stylish accessories that are lightweight and versatile for different occasions. Additionally, I tend to favor products that are affordable yet do not compromise on quality, and I prefer items that are easy to care for and durable over time.

This positive dissatisfaction compels them to constantly improve upon their footwear.
